channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: OmniParser for Pure Vision Based GUI Agent
item.description: The recent success of large vision language models shows great potential in driving the agent system operating on user interfaces.

item.title: Data Formulator 2: Iteratively Creating Rich Visualizations with AI
item.description: To create rich visualizations, data analysts often need to iterate back and forth among data processing and chart specification to achieve their goals.

item.title: Scaling up Test-Time Compute with Latent Reasoning: A Recurrent Depth Approach
item.description: We scale a proof-of-concept model to 3. 5 billion parameters and 800 billion tokens.

item.title: PIKE-RAG: sPecIalized KnowledgE and Rationale Augmented Generation
item.description: Despite notable advancements in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems that expand large language model (LLM) capabilities through external retrieval, these systems often struggle to meet the complex and diverse needs of real-world industrial applications.

item.title: Light-A-Video: Training-free Video Relighting via Progressive Light Fusion
item.description: Second, leveraging the physical principle of light transport independence, we apply linear blending between the source video's appearance and the relighted appearance, using a Progressive Light Fusion (PLF) strategy to ensure smooth temporal transitions in illumination.

item.title: Magic 1-For-1: Generating One Minute Video Clips within One Minute
item.description: The key idea is simple: factorize the text-to-video generation task into two separate easier tasks for diffusion step distillation, namely text-to-image generation and image-to-video generation.

item.title: Agentic Reasoning: Reasoning LLMs with Tools for the Deep Research
item.description: We introduce Agentic Reasoning, a framework that enhances large language model (LLM) reasoning by integrating external tool-using agents.

item.title: CodeI/O: Condensing Reasoning Patterns via Code Input-Output Prediction
item.description: Reasoning is a fundamental capability of Large Language Models.

item.title: Flaming-hot Initiation with Regular Execution Sampling for Large Language Models
item.description: Since the release of ChatGPT, large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable capabilities across various domains.

item.title: Cut Your Losses in Large-Vocabulary Language Models
item.description: We implement a custom kernel that performs the matrix multiplications and the log-sum-exp reduction over the vocabulary in flash memory, making global memory consumption for the cross-entropy computation negligible.

item.title: MedRAX: Medical Reasoning Agent for Chest X-ray
item.description: Chest X-rays (CXRs) play an integral role in driving critical decisions in disease management and patient care.

item.title: Align Anything: Training All-Modality Models to Follow Instructions with Language Feedback
item.description: In this work, we make the first attempt to fine-tune all-modality models (i. e. input and output with any modality, also named any-to-any models) using human preference data across all modalities (including text, image, audio, and video), ensuring its behavior aligns with human intentions.

item.title: FlashVideo:Flowing Fidelity to Detail for Efficient High-Resolution Video Generation
item.description: DiT diffusion models have achieved great success in text-to-video generation, leveraging their scalability in model capacity and data scale.

item.title: Enhance-A-Video: Better Generated Video for Free
item.description: DiT-based video generation has achieved remarkable results, but research into enhancing existing models remains relatively unexplored.

item.title: IntellAgent: A Multi-Agent Framework for Evaluating Conversational AI Systems
item.description: IntellAgent represents a paradigm shift in evaluating conversational AI.

item.title: Temporal Working Memory: Query-Guided Segment Refinement for Enhanced Multimodal Understanding
item.description: To overcome these challenges, we introduce a specialized cognitive module, temporal working memory (TWM), which aims to enhance the temporal modeling capabilities of MFMs.

item.title: GS-CPR: Efficient Camera Pose Refinement via 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: We leverage 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) as a scene representation and propose a novel test-time camera pose refinement (CPR) framework, GS-CPR.

item.title: LIMO: Less is More for Reasoning
item.description: While conventional wisdom suggests that sophisticated reasoning tasks demand extensive training data (>100, 000 examples), we demonstrate that complex mathematical reasoning abilities can be effectively elicited with surprisingly few examples.

item.title: Free-Form Image Inpainting with Gated Convolution
item.description: We present a generative image inpainting system to complete images with free-form mask and guidance.

item.title: Meta Audiobox Aesthetics: Unified Automatic Quality Assessment for Speech, Music, and Sound
item.description: The quantification of audio aesthetics remains a complex challenge in audio processing, primarily due to its subjective nature, which is influenced by human perception and cultural context.
